scripts.test:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "npm run test"
scripts.build:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "npm run build"
scripts.build:wasm: npm run build && npx -y tree-sitter-cli build-wasm --docker
scripts.playground: npm run build:wasm && npx -y tree-sitter-cli playground
scripts.playground:quiet: npm run build:wasm && npx -y tree-sitter-cli playground -q
scripts.playground:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "npm run playground:quiet"
